name: Doreen the Dryad
title: I distrust the gnome, but...
copy: Nature abhors imbalance, and there was nothing natural about the way those bedeviled dice behaved. Fearing contaminating the natural world with their evil, Die-Sposal helped me work out a containment plan.

name: Gary the Goblin
title: What did I have to lose?
copy: My dignity? I didn't feel any more like an idiot holding a D20 against my screen than I did fumbling my pickpocketing attempt on the town guard. Worst case scenario I still don't end up tarred and feathered.

name: Morty the Minotaur
title: DICE BETRAY MORTY
copy: WHEN DICE FAIL MORTY FOR LAST TIME LEADING TO UNSATISFYING DEATH OF MORTYS BARD... MORTY KNOW IT TIME FOR CHANGE. SOMETIMES CHANGE INVOLVE SMASHING.
